text: Trolls [[sl:campaign_factions]]factions[[/sl]] use [[img:icon_skaven_food]][[/img]]Food as currency. The available [[img:icon_skaven_food]][[/img]]Food is shown at the top of the screen on the game interface.

[[sl:campaign_settlements]]Settlements[[/sl]] can produce a small amount of [[img:icon_skaven_food]][[/img]][[sl:campaign_income]]food[[/sl]]. The more sty's a [[sl:campaign_factions]]faction[[/sl]] controls, the more {{tr:icon_money}}[[sl:campaign_money]]food[[/sl]] it can make.

[[sl:campaign_unit_recruitment]]Recruitment[[/sl]] of new [[sl:campaign_units]]units[[/sl]], the upkeep of existing units and the construction of [[sl:campaign_buildings]]buildings[[/sl]] all deplete Food.

[[img:icon_skaven_food]][[/img]]Food is generated mainly by capturing enemy settlements and post battle. The food a building generates is shown when the cursor is placed over its icon on the [[sl:campaign_province_overview_panel]]Province Overview panel[[/sl]].

Food Stash||This is the total amount of [[img:icon_skaven_food]][[/img]]Food available to your faction. Food can be accrued by sacking and razing enemy settlements, buildings, raiding and diplomacy.
In order to research this technology, this settlement must be captured and held for a turn.
We have attained complete control of this [[url:script_link_campaign_provinces]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_provinces}}]]province[[/tooltip]][[/url]].

The more warbands you field, the harder it becomes to maintain them all. As supply lines become more complex, gold and supplies will ‘go missing’ -  the chieftains having little idea where they may have gone...

WHAT AND WHERE DIS. The men and monsters of the north have long sought to overthrow the civilisations of the south, but have always been thrown back to their frozen wastelands. But no more! Now, under your control, the Norscan hordes have been unleashed upon the Old World. The Chaos Gods gaze admiringly falls upon the leader of this cataclysmic event: you!
YOUR CHAMP UI TEXT REP

In order to research this technology, this settlement must be captured and held for a turn.

[[img:icon_loyalty]][[/img]]Loyalty is a measure of the willingness of a [[img:icon_general]][[/img]][[sl:campaign_lords]]Lord[[/sl]] of the [[sl:campaign_dark_elves]]Dark Elves[[/sl]], [[sl:campaign_skaven]]Skaven[[/sl]], Trolls or [[sl:campaign_vampire_coast]]Vampire Coast[[/sl]] to follow the leader of his or her [[sl:campaign_factions]]faction[[/sl]]. Should a Lord’s loyalty reach 0 they will rebel, taking their [[sl:campaign_armies]]army[[/sl]] with them to form a new faction or as trolls abandon your faction..
